    def test_happiness_assessment(self):

        Assertions.assert_status_code(response_to_auth, 200)
        access_token = self.get_json_value(response_to_auth, "access_token")

        Assertions.assert_status_code(response_user_me, 200)
        ses_cookie = self.get_cookie(response_user_me, "ses")
    
        response_start_ha_dialog = ConnectRequests.send("GET", "v1/users/dialog/ha/", cookies={"ses": ses_cookie})
    
        Assertions.assert_status_code(response_start_ha_dialog, 200)

        conversation_id = self.get_json_value(response_start_ha_dialog, "conversation_id")
        turn_number = self.get_json_value(response_start_ha_dialog, "turn_number")
